seo_keywords: Shark Vertex brush roll indicator flashing
Shark AZ2002 soft roller not spinning

problems.title: Soft Roller Not Spinning / Light Flashing
problems.description: The front soft orange roller isn't turning, or the nozzle light flashes.
possible_causes: Debris jammed behind the soft roller
solution_steps: Slide the 'Access' buttons to pop open the brush roll garage.
Pull out the soft roller and clean the hair behind it.
Wash the soft roller if it's dirty (let dry for 24h).
Firmly close the garage lid on both sides until it clicks.

problems.title: Suction Loss / Filters Dirty
problems.description: Vacuum feels weak. This model has powerful suction, so any drop is noticeable.
possible_causes: Foam/Felt filters are clogged with fine dust
solution_steps: Check the foam filters under the dust cup. If they are black, wash them.
Replace the HEPA filter once a year.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Vertex DuoClean PowerFins (AZ2002)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $308 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Vertex DuoClean PowerFins (AZ2002) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Vertex DuoClean PowerFins (AZ2002) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
